item.title: As Warren Buffett retires, uncertainty looms for Berkshire Hathaway
item.description: What direction will his anointed successor take?

item.title: Brazil’s general election will be all about Lula—again
item.description: The left-wing stalwart has emerged as the favourite; the right is in disarray

item.title: Russia is blasting Odessa to throttle Ukraine’s economy
item.description: Putin’s assault aims to terrorise civilians and cripple ports

item.title: Inside China’s nascent, AI-powered military logistics system
item.description: The PLA is already testing technologies that range from widespread sensors to AI-enabled predictive planning, cargo drones, and tracked UGV mules.

item.title: New in SpyTalk: What's the Use of Intelligence if Trump Doesn't Care?
item.description: Shaky Nigeria and Venezuela intel; a CIA asset's fate; more FBI drama; John Brennan court case; and Greenland intrigue round out the week
